mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, number, NAME, sex, phone, card, qq, wexin, groups, permissions, qqnc, address, remark, TIME, OPEN, creat_user_id ) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wexin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groups,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissions,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qqnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{open,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update member
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wexin = #{wexin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groups = #{groups,jdbcType=BIGINT},
permissions = #{permissions,jdbcType=BIGINT},
qqnc = #{qqnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPEN = #{open,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_user_id = #{creatUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update member set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wexin = #{wexin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groups = #{groups,jdbcType=BIGINT}, permissions = #{permissions,jdbcType=BIGINT}, qqnc = #{qqnc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPEN = #{open,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_user_id = #{creatUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.number, m.NAME, m.sex, m.phone, m.card, m.qq, m.wexin, m.groups, m.qqnc, m.address, m.remark, m.TIME, m.OPEN, m.creat_user_id FROM member m LEFT JOIN user_member um ON m.member_id= um.member_id WHERE um.user_id =#{id};
